channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 09:05 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further reports.
item.description: 🟢 09:05 Return the threat of Artobstil in Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community. Take care of further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 08:53 Air alarm to Donetsk Region follow the following messages.
item.description: 🔴 08:53 Air alarm to Donetsk Region follow the following messages.#Donetsk_Blast This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
